verses.text: \w For|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* choirmaster. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w Psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w of|strong="H4210"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w song|strong="H7892"\w*. God arises. \w His|strong="H1732"\w* enemies are scattered, \w and|strong="H1732"\w* those who hate \w Him|strong="H1732"\w* flee \w His|strong="H1732"\w* presence.

\w As|strong="H6440"\w* smoke \w is|strong="H6440"\w* blown \w away|strong="H5127"\w*, \w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H6440"\w* \w drive|strong="H6327"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w out|strong="H6440"\w*; \w as|strong="H6440"\w* wax melts \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* fire, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* wicked \w will|strong="H6440"\w* perish \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* God.

\w But|strong="H7563"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* righteous \w will|strong="H7563"\w* \w be|strong="H7563"\w* glad \w and|strong="H6440"\w* rejoice \w before|strong="H6440"\w* God; \w they|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H7563"\w* celebrate \w with|strong="H6440"\w* joy.

Sing \w to|strong="H6440"\w* God! Sing praises \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w His|strong="H6440"\w* name. Exalt \w Him|strong="H6440"\w* \w who|strong="H6662"\w* rides \w on|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* clouds—\w His|strong="H6440"\w* name \w is|strong="H6662"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*—\w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Him|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w A|strong="H3068"\w* father \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* fatherless \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* defender \w of|strong="H6440"\w* widows \w is|strong="H8034"\w* \w God|strong="H3050"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w His|strong="H6440"\w* holy habitation.

God settles \w the|strong="H6944"\w* lonely \w in|strong="H4583"\w* families; He leads \w the|strong="H6944"\w* prisoners out \w to|strong="H6944"\w* prosperity, but \w the|strong="H6944"\w* rebellious dwell \w in|strong="H4583"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sun-scorched land.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w when|strong="H3318"\w* \w You|strong="H3318"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w before|strong="H3427"\w* \w Your|strong="H3318"\w* \w people|strong="H3427"\w*, \w when|strong="H3318"\w* \w You|strong="H3318"\w* \w marched|strong="H3318"\w* \w through|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* wasteland, Selah

\w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth shook \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* heavens poured \w down|strong="H6440"\w* rain \w before|strong="H6440"\w* God, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* One \w on|strong="H3318"\w* Sinai, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* God, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* God \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israel|strong="H5971"\w*.
\w You|strong="H6440"\w* sent abundant rain, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w*; \w You|strong="H6440"\w* refreshed \w Your|strong="H6440"\w* weary inheritance.

\w Your|strong="H3559"\w* flock settled therein; \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w from|strong="H1653"\w* \w Your|strong="H3559"\w* bounty \w You|strong="H5159"\w* \w provided|strong="H3559"\w* \w for|strong="H3559"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* poor.

\w The|strong="H3559"\w* Lord gives \w the|strong="H3559"\w* command; \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H2896"\w* \w company|strong="H2416"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* women proclaim \w it|strong="H3559"\w*:

“Kings \w and|strong="H7227"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w armies|strong="H6635"\w* flee \w in|strong="H7227"\w* haste; she \w who|strong="H7227"\w* waits \w at|strong="H5414"\w* home divides \w the|strong="H5414"\w* plunder.

Though \w you|strong="H4428"\w* lie down among \w the|strong="H2505"\w* \w sheepfolds|strong="H5116"\w*, \w the|strong="H2505"\w* wings \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H2505"\w* dove \w are|strong="H1004"\w* covered \w with|strong="H1004"\w* silver, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* her feathers \w with|strong="H1004"\w* shimmering gold.”

\w When|strong="H7901"\w* \w the|strong="H7901"\w* Almighty scattered \w the|strong="H7901"\w* kings \w in|strong="H7901"\w* \w the|strong="H7901"\w* land, it \w was|strong="H3671"\w* \w like|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H7901"\w* snow falling \w on|strong="H7901"\w* Zalmon.

\w A|strong="H3068"\w* mountain \w of|strong="H4428"\w* God \w is|strong="H4428"\w* Mount Bashan; \w a|strong="H3068"\w* mountain \w of|strong="H4428"\w* many peaks \w is|strong="H4428"\w* Mount Bashan.

Why do \w you|strong="H2022"\w* gaze \w in|strong="H2022"\w* envy, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* many \w peaks|strong="H1386"\w*? This is \w the|strong="H2022"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* God chose \w for|strong="H2022"\w* His dwelling, where \w the|strong="H2022"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H2022"\w* surely dwell forever.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* chariots \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* tens \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thousands—thousands \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thousands \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w*; \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* sanctuary \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* Sinai.

You \w have|strong="H6944"\w* ascended \w on|strong="H7393"\w* high; You \w have|strong="H6944"\w* led captives away. You \w have|strong="H6944"\w* received \w gifts|strong="H6944"\w* \w from|strong="H7393"\w* men, even \w from|strong="H7393"\w* \w the|strong="H6944"\w* rebellious, \w that|strong="H6944"\w* \w the|strong="H6944"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* God may dwell there.

Blessed be \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3050"\w*, who daily bears \w our|strong="H3947"\w* burden, \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w God|strong="H3050"\w* \w of|strong="H4791"\w* \w our|strong="H3947"\w* salvation. Selah

\w Our|strong="H1288"\w* God \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* God \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w deliverance|strong="H3444"\w*; \w the|strong="H3117"\w* Lord \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w our|strong="H1288"\w* rescuer \w from|strong="H3117"\w* death.

Surely \w God|strong="H3069"\w* \w will|strong="H3069"\w* crush \w the|strong="H3069"\w* heads \w of|strong="H4194"\w* His enemies, \w the|strong="H3069"\w* hairy crowns \w of|strong="H4194"\w* those who persist \w in|strong="H4194"\w* guilty ways.

\w The|strong="H1980"\w* Lord said, “\w I|strong="H1980"\w* will retrieve them \w from|strong="H1980"\w* Bashan, \w I|strong="H1980"\w* will \w bring|strong="H1980"\w* them \w up|strong="H1980"\w* \w from|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* depths \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* sea,

\w that|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* foot \w may|strong="H7725"\w* \w be|strong="H7725"\w* dipped \w in|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* blood \w of|strong="H3220"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* foes—\w the|strong="H7725"\w* tongues \w of|strong="H3220"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* dogs \w in|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* same.”

\w They|strong="H7272"\w* \w have|strong="H7272"\w* seen \w Your|strong="H4480"\w* procession, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God—\w the|strong="H4480"\w* march \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* God \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w King|strong="H4616"\w* \w into|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* sanctuary.

\w The|strong="H7200"\w* singers lead \w the|strong="H7200"\w* way, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* musicians follow \w after|strong="H7200"\w*, \w among|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* maidens playing tambourines.

Bless God \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* great congregation; bless \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* fountain \w of|strong="H8432"\w* Israel.

\w There|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* Benjamin, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* youngest, ruling \w them|strong="H1288"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* princes \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Judah \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* company, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* princes \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Zebulun \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Naphtali.

Summon \w Your|strong="H8033"\w* power, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God; show \w Your|strong="H8033"\w* strength, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w which|strong="H8033"\w* You \w have|strong="H3063"\w* exerted on \w our|strong="H8033"\w* behalf.
Because \w of|strong="H6466"\w* \w Your|strong="H6680"\w* temple \w at|strong="H6680"\w* Jerusalem kings \w will|strong="H5797"\w* bring \w You|strong="H6680"\w* gifts.

Rebuke \w the|strong="H5921"\w* beast \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* reeds, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* herd \w of|strong="H4428"\w* bulls \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* calves \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* nations, \w until|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* submits, bringing bars \w of|strong="H4428"\w* silver. Scatter \w the|strong="H5921"\w* nations \w who|strong="H4428"\w* delight \w in|strong="H5921"\w* war.
Envoys \w will|strong="H5971"\w* arrive \w from|strong="H2416"\w* Egypt; Cush \w will|strong="H5971"\w* stretch out her hands \w to|strong="H5971"\w* God.

Sing \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* kingdoms \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* earth; sing praises \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* Lord—Selah

\w to|strong="H4467"\w* Him \w who|strong="H7891"\w* rides \w upon|strong="H4467"\w* \w the|strong="H2167"\w* highest heavens \w of|strong="H4467"\w* old; \w behold|strong="H7891"\w*, \w His|strong="H7891"\w* mighty voice resounds.

\w Ascribe|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w power|strong="H5797"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w*, whose majesty \w is|strong="H6963"\w* \w over|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israel|strong="H8064"\w*, whose \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* \w is|strong="H6963"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* skies.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w*, \w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* awesome \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Your|strong="H5414"\w* sanctuary; \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* Himself \w gives|strong="H5414"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w power|strong="H5797"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w His|strong="H5414"\w* people. Blessed \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w*!
